headline: Lockheed Martin: Profitability Is A Problem
summary: Lockheed Martin's margins and return on invested capital have fallen sharply, with net income down 35% from its 2020 peak. Read why LMT stock is a Sell.

headline: NOC Secures a Contract to Aid Stand-In Attack Weapon Subsystem
summary: Northrop Grumman lands a $100M contract to advance Stand-in Attack Weapon work, bolstering active-seeker development and strike capabilities.

headline: Which Defense Giant Shows Stronger Momentum Today - LMT or RTX?
summary: Lockheed Martin and RTX show contrasting momentum as fresh contracts, earnings shifts and rising defense demand highlight differing strengths.

headline: Lockheed Martin CFO to Speak at the Goldman Sachs Industrials and Materials 2025 Conference
summary: Lockheed Martin (NYSE: LMT) Chief Financial Officer Evan Scott will participate in a fireside chat at the Goldman Sachs Industrials and Materials 2025 Conference on Wednesday, Dec. 3, from 1:30 to 2:05 p.m. ET.

headline: Lockheed Martin (LMT): Analyst Upgrades and International Deals Put Spotlight on Valuation After Dividend, Buyback Boost
summary: Lockheed Martin (LMT) has caught the attention of investors following several analyst upgrades that point to the company’s strong order backlog, improved operational performance, and recent uptick in international defense contracts. Amid ongoing geopolitical shifts, management’s move to boost its dividend and share repurchase program is viewed as a signal of confidence in the business outlook. See our latest analysis for Lockheed Martin. Despite turbulent markets, Lockheed Martin’s share...
